product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Breeze Pack - Special Buy
long_description: With its well-vented back, the Breeze Pack from Alps Mountaineering lives up to its name by allowing maximum airflow to keep you cool while you hike. Vented back panel allows cooling breezes to pass through. Aluminum frame and padded waistbelt support heavy loads. 25-liter capacity is just right for holding your essential gear. 2 neoprene stretch side pockets stow water bottles; 1 larger stretch pocket on the front easily stows a light jacket or hat, gloves, etc. Hydration sleeve and port (hydration reservoir not included); safety whistle on sternum strap. Alps Mountaineering Breeze Pack has a daisy chain so you can attach extra gear while hiking or traveling. Special buy.
short_description: With its well-vented back, the Breeze Pack from Alps Mountaineering lives up to its name by allowing maximum airflow to keep you cool while you hike.
